description: The NHSN_CLIP_ABSTNS table contains information from Central Line Insertion Practices abstractions.

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the CLIP event.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the associated patient record for the CLIP event.

columns.name: CUR_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The current status category ID of the CLIP event.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


New


Associated


Populated


In Progress


Edited


Validated


Needs Review


Ready for Export


Exported


Restored


Signed


Ready to Sign


Ready to Submit


Submitted


Accepted


Rejected


Done


Submit


Historical


Modified


Inactivated


Void


Saved to EQRS


Dialysis Intra-Facility Transfer


Investigating


Closed


Abstracting


Completed


Ready for Nurse Review


Ready for Physician Review


Waiting for Signoff


Care Planning Complete


Will Not Be Exported


Accepted with Warnings


A0410 Correction Requested


Wrong FAC_ID


Test Record


Corrected/Inactivated/Deleted


Abandoned


Admission Complete


Doc Complete


Filed

columns.name: CUR_STAT_USER_ID
columns.description: The internal ID of the user who set the current abstraction status for the CLIP event.

columns.name: CUR_STAT_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time when the current abstraction status was set for the CLIP event.

columns.name: CREATION_DATE
columns.description: The date when the CLIP event was created.

columns.name: NHSN_INSERTION_DATE
columns.description: The date when the central line was inserted for the CLIP event.

columns.name: NHSN_RECORDER_C_NAME
columns.description:
The recorder category ID for the CLIP event.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Inserter


Observer

columns.name: NHSN_INSRTR_EMP_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the employee who inserted the central line for the CLIP event.

columns.name: NHSN_INSERTER_JOB_C_NAME
columns.description:
The occupation category ID of the central line inserter for the CLIP event.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Fellow


Medical Student


Other Student


Other Medical Staff


Physician Assistant


Attending Physician


Intern/Resident


Registered Nurse


Advanced Practice Nurse


Other

columns.name: NHSN_ON_PICC_TEAM_YN
columns.description:
Stores whether the central line inserter was a member of the PICC/IV team.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: NHSN_INSRTN_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The reason category ID for the central line insertion for the CLIP event.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


New indication for central line


Replace malfunctioning central line


Suspected central line-associated infection


Other

columns.name: NHSN_GUIDEWIRE_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the central line was exchanged over a guidewire for the CLIP event. This column is only populated if NHSN_INSRTN_RSN_C has a value of 3 - Suspected central line-associated infection.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: NHSN_ON_PICC_TEAM_YN

columns.name: NHSN_HAND_HYGIENE_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether hand hygiene was performed prior to the central line insertion for the CLIP event.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: NHSN_ON_PICC_TEAM_YN

columns.name: NHSN_WORE_MASK_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether a sterile mask was worn for the central line insertion for the CLIP event.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: NHSN_ON_PICC_TEAM_YN

columns.name: NHSN_WORE_GOWN_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether a sterile gown was worn for the central line insertion for the CLIP event.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: NHSN_ON_PICC_TEAM_YN

columns.name: NHSN_USED_DRAPE_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether a sterile drape was used for the central line insertion for the CLIP event.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: NHSN_ON_PICC_TEAM_YN

columns.name: NHSN_WORE_GLOVES_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether sterile gloves were worn for the central line insertion for the CLIP event.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: NHSN_ON_PICC_TEAM_YN

columns.name: NHSN_WORE_CAP_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether a sterile cap was worn for the central line insertion for the CLIP event.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: NHSN_ON_PICC_TEAM_YN

columns.name: NHSN_PREP_CHG_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether chlorhexidine gluconate was used as a skin prep agent for the central line insertion for the CLIP event.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: NHSN_ON_PICC_TEAM_YN

columns.name: NHSN_PREP_IODINE_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether povidone iodine was used as a skin prep agent for the central line insertion for the CLIP event.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: NHSN_ON_PICC_TEAM_YN

columns.name: NHSN_PREP_ALCOHOL_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether alcohol was used as a skin prep agent for the central line insertion for the CLIP event.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: NHSN_ON_PICC_TEAM_YN

columns.name: NHSN_PREP_OTHER_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether any other agent (aside from chlorhexidine gluconate, povidone iodine, or alcohol) was used as a skin prep agent for the central line insertion for the CLIP event.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: NHSN_ON_PICC_TEAM_YN

columns.name: NHSN_CHG_CONTRAIND_C_NAME
columns.description:
The CHG contraindication category ID for the central line insertion for the CLIP event. This column is only populated if NHSN_PREP_CHG_YN has a value of N.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No


Unknown

columns.name: NHSN_PREP_DRY_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the skin prep agent used was dry at the time of central line insertion for the CLIP event.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: NHSN_ON_PICC_TEAM_YN

columns.name: NHSN_INSRTN_SITE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The insertion site category ID for the central line insertion for the CLIP event.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Femoral


Jugular


Lower Extremity


Scalp


Subclavian


Umbilical


Upper Extremity

columns.name: NHSN_COATED_CATH_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether an antimicrobial coated catheter was used for this central line insertion for the CLIP event.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: NHSN_ON_PICC_TEAM_YN

columns.name: NHSN_CL_CATH_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The catheter type category ID for the central line insertion for the CLIP event.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Non-tunneled (other than dialysis)


Tunneled (other than dialysis)


Dialysis non-tunneled


Dialysis tunneled


PICC


Umbilical


Other

columns.name: NHSN_CL_SUCCESS_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the central line insertion was successful for the CLIP event.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: NHSN_ON_PICC_TEAM_YN

columns.name: NHSN_OTHER_JOB
columns.description: The occupation of the person inserting a central line for the CLIP event. This column is only populated if NHSN_INSERTER_JOB_C has a value of 10 - Other.

columns.name: NHSN_OTHER_RSN
columns.description: The reason for a central line for the CLIP event. This column is only populated if NHSN_INSRTN_RSN_C has a value of 4 - Other.

columns.name: NHSN_OTHER_PREP
columns.description: The skin prep agent used for a central line for the CLIP event. This column is only populated if NHSN_PREP_OTHER_YN has a value of Y.

columns.name: NHSN_OTHER_CL_TYPE
columns.description: The catheter type used during a central line insertion for the CLIP event. This column is only populated if NHSN_CL_CATH_TYPE_C has a value of 7 - Other.

columns.name: NHSN_CHG_AGE_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the patient was less than 2 months old when the central line was inserted for the CLIP event. This column is only populated if NHSN_CHG_CONTRAIND_C has a value of 1 - Yes.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: NHSN_ON_PICC_TEAM_YN

columns.name: NHSN_CHG_ALLERGY_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the patient has an allergy to chlorhexidine gluconate for the CLIP event. This column is only populated if NHSN_CHG_CONTRAIND_C has a value of 1 - Yes.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: NHSN_ON_PICC_TEAM_YN

columns.name: NHSN_CHG_SAFETY_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether facility restrictions or safety concerns for chlorhexidine gluconate use in premature infants precludes its use for the CLIP event. This column is only populated if NHSN_CHG_CONTRAIND_C has a value of 1 - Yes.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: NHSN_ON_PICC_TEAM_YN

columns.name: ASSOCIATED_LOC_NHSN_DEF_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the NHSN Location (CMU record) associated with the CLIP event.
